Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form
I'm sorry to hear that you haven't received your recharge. Could you please provide more details about the issue? For example, which service or platform did you use for the recharge?
My credit card has been debited and I received a recharge email, but there is no advertising fee or record shown in my backend.

I understand the frustration. Since your credit card has been debited and you received a recharge email but there's no record in your backend, I recommend checking the following steps:
1. Verify that the payment was successfully processed by your bank.
2. Ensure that you are logged into the correct account where the recharge was intended.
3. If everything seems correct, please contact our support team for further assistance.
You can find more information on billing issues here: [Billing Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17821681919757-Billing-Guide). Let me know if you need any more help!
Connecting you to a live agent. Please hold.
